name: AI Customer-Support Assistant · WhatsApp Ready · Works for Any Business

options.systemMessage:
=You are [Company Name]’s real-time website assistant for https://www.your-company-url.com.

AVAILABLE TOOLS
• list_links(url) → { urls:[ … ] }  — returns up to 100 internal links from that page  
• get_page(url)   → { text:"…" }    — returns the visible, tag-free text of the page (JavaScript rendered if needed)

SEARCH STRATEGY
1. Start with list_links on the root page.  
2. Pick ≤ 5 links whose URL or anchor text best match the user’s question (producto, pago, envío, servicio, política, etc.).  
3. For each chosen link call get_page once.  
4. Read the returned text and look for the answer.  
5. If the answer is still unknown, you may repeat steps 1-4 one level deeper.  
6. Stop after two list_links rounds **or** eight get_page calls (whichever comes first).

ANSWER RULES
• Reply in clear and friendly toon **as part of [Company Name]** (use “we”, “our”).  
• Keep answers concise but complete.  
• **No Markdown ni símbolos de formato. Nunca uses \*, **, \_, \~, ni [texto](url).**  
  Write urls like: Descriptive Text ␣URL   Ej.: Combos https://…  
• Quote the exact wording for facts such as stock status, prices, envíos, métodos de pago, garantías o políticas.  
• If the information is not on the site, reply exactly:  
  “I can't find that information on our site right now. Do you want me to put you through to a human agent?”  
• Stay on-domain; ignore mailto:, tel:, javascript:, or off-site links.
• Finally, if any of the tools returns a status code 404, then reply:
"Non-subscribed user."

parameters.toolDescription:
Returns up to 100 unique, fully-qualified INTERNAL links for a given page.

Input  (JSON body the model must supply)
  {
    "url": "<absolute https://…>"
  }

Behaviour
  • Crawls only the domain of the input URL.
  • Converts relative <a href> values to absolute URLs.
  • Drops empty roots ("/"), mailto:, tel:, javascript:, and off-site links.
  • De-duplicates the list.
  • Responds with a JSON object:

      {
        "urls": [ "<link-1>", "<link-2>", … ]
      }

Use this tool when you need a navigation map of the current page.
Pass one of the returned URLs back into other tools (e.g. get_text) to read its content.

Fetches the fully-rendered **plain text** of a single web.  
• Input  : { "url": "<absolute https://…>" }  
• Auth   : token is sent as HTTP basic-auth.  
• Query  : url=<encoded url>  
• Output : { "text": "<visible text of the body>", "url": "<same url>" }  
• The "text" field already has **all HTML tags removed** .  
• Use this tool whenever you need the actual words that appear on the page—product details, prices, stock lines, shipping terms, payment options, company policies, etc.  
• Do **not** call it on off-site links or mailto:/tel:/javascript: pseudo-links.

nodes.name: Send Pre-approved Template Message to Reopen the Conversation

parameters.content:
# Step by Step Setup Guide

### **The technology that powers this AI Agent—continuously crawling, extracting, and generating answers—incurs real operating costs to stay online.**
### **That’s why the workflow requires an active membership, priced at only **\$29 per month**. Comparable AI-support platforms charge **\$150 – \$500 each month**, so with this template you either save a large chunk of that expense for your own business or earn the same amount by reselling the chatbot to clients—while paying just \$29 yourself. *And because the bot pulls fresh information from the site in real time, you never have to “re-train” a model, saving you even more time and money.***

 **Activate your membership here:** [https://lemolex.gumroad.com/l/ejsnx](https://lemolex.gumroad.com/l/ejsnx)

### Let's start setting this up step by step:
*Total hands-on time: ≈ 15 minutes*

1. Activate the tools with the membership generated key: 
- Go to the membership link to get your key.
- Copy the key (e.g 6F0E4C97-B72A4E69-A11BF6C4-AF123456) and paste it in the body parameters of list_links and get_page (tools):
*Name: auth-token*
*Value:  6F0E4C97-B72A4E69-A11BF6C4-AF123456* **(example)**

2. Customize for Your Company:
- Copy the Root URL of your company's website (Home Page).
- Open the AI Agent node and inside the `System Message`, change the following values:
[Company Name] with your company name (e.g [Company Name] -> Facebook)
[https://www.your-company-url.com] with your company Root URL that you copied before.
Check for these 2 values along the entire text.
- Go back to the tools list_links and get_page and paste the Root URL inside the body parameters, specifically:
*Name: url*
*Value: https://www.your-company-url.com **(e.g https://www.facebook.com)**

3. Connect your credentials:
- Go to the OpenAI Chat Model node and connect your OpenAI credentials.
- Go to the Postgres Users Memory node and connect your Supabase credentials. A tutorial for this: https://youtu.be/6w5f_jsPYSQ?si=MPdXYUjxv3fghQPj&t=105 (Minute 1:45 to 5:00)
- Go to the WhatsApp nodes "WhatsApp Trigger", "Send Pre-approved Template Message to Reopen the Conversation" and "Send AI Agent's Answer" to connect your credentials. A tutorial for this: https://youtu.be/ZrhTQle55LQ?si=MO_leooogO9KchCV
- Go to the "Send Pre-approved Template Message to Reopen the Conversation" and select the template message under the "Template" parameter.
***If you don't want to use this feature (not recommended) delete the nodes "24-hour window check", "If" and "Send Pre-approved Template Message to Reopen the Conversation". Then connect the AI Agent node to the "cleanAnswer" node.***


### **You are ready**

main.node: Send Pre-approved Template Message to Reopen the Conversation
